meanings.definition: A stone or wooden slab, generally taller than it is wide, erected as a monument.
meanings.sent1: The ancient civilization placed a stela to honor their leaders.
meanings.sent2: Tourists gathered around the stela to read the inscriptions.
meanings.sent3: The stela seemed to whisper stories of the past to those who listened.
meanings.sent4: The stela stood tall like a guardian of history.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the stela captured the attention of all who passed by.

meanings.definition: A vertical stone or wooden slab with an inscribed or sculptured surface, used as a monument or commemorative marker.
meanings.sent1: The stela displayed detailed carvings depicting ancient rituals.
meanings.sent2: Scholars studied the stela to understand the culture of the past.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended the stela was a talking statue.
meanings.sent4: The stela's engravings seemed to come alive in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: Visitors marveled at the stela's intricate designs, amazed by the craftsmanship.
